name: ANTHYMN
blurb: Fantasy adventure MMORPG which sets the stage for players to create, share, and wield the power of music together.

rewards.reward: $5 or more\r\nThank you for your backing Anthymn! Every backer for this level or more will receive a KICKSTARTER ANTHYMN BACKER BADGE on the ANTHYMN COMMUNITY FORUMS. Once the KS is finished, we want to invite you to our forums where you get to discuss game features, story content and interact with the development team on a daily basis.

DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY OF ANTHYMN. This tier is only available during Kickstarter! All Kickstarter backers will receive a special KICKSTARTER IN GAME CHARACTER TITLE, TRINKET ITEM and access to Making of Anthymn Documentary streaming videos.
Previous reward tiers + DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE SOUNDTRACK including 25 tracks including 5 bonus tracks exclusive to Kickstarter backers.

Previous reward tiers + NEW ANTHYMN PROLOGUE NOVELLA BY RILEY MCDOUGALL (PDF) + EXCLUSIVE IN-GAME PET + DIGITAL HIGH RESOLUTION GAME MAP + DIGITAL HIGH RESOLUTION CONCEPT ART PIECES + WALLPAPERS FOR MULTIPLE MONITORS

Previous reward tiers + BOX VERSION OF ANTHYMN. The boxed copy will include a DVD version of the game and a printed manual. This is in addition to the digital version of the game (so 2 copies total!).

Previous reward tiers + DIGITAL STRATEGY GUIDE PDF + ANOTHER DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF THE GAME. We are going to be working in conjunction with a great strategy guide company and at this reward level you will get a PDF of the guide.
Previous reward tiers + ANTHYMN SHATTER or UNITE T-SHIRT + THANK YOU PACKAGE FROM THE DEVELOPMENT TEAM + VIP BACKER FORUM BADGE.
Previous reward tier + SPECIAL THANKS IN GAME CREDITS + EARLY ACCESS BETA KEY.

Previous reward tiers + we will upgrade your box to an ANTHYMN COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOX. You will find a CLOTH MAP OF THE GAME WORLD and the ANTHYMN INSTRUMENT WRAP inside the box. Includes Making of Anthymn Documentary Blu-ray DVD. The cloth map and instrument wrap is an embroidered high quality non-iron on patch.

Previous reward tier + you get your COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOX signed by the development team + full color printed ANTHYMN APPRENTICE BOOK + an elite version of the INSTRUMENT WRAP. The Apprentice Book will be a full color book that includes concept art, player's handbook, monster manual, exclusive information about the campaign settings/NPC characters, and a special behind the scenes look at making the game.

Previous reward tiers + ANTHYMN *HARD COVER* APPRENTICE BOOK SIGNED by the development team + IN GAME VIP SPECIAL THANKS CREDIT + Your name will also be etched into our stained glass plaque at String Theory so we can always remember your special contribution.
Previous reward tiers + 1 CONCEPT ART POSTER PRINT of your choice signed by the development team.

CREATE YOUR OWN NPC! We will send a character sheet with race, class, feature and name options for you to choose from allowing us to model your NPC for the shipped game. You will also receive all rewards from the $500 tier + 5 EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF ANTHYMN.

HELP DESIGN AN EPIC HIGH LEVEL WEAPON OR INSTRUMENT! We will send you an item sheet with shape, color, materials, style and name options for you to choose from allowing us to model your weapon or instrument for the shipped game. You will also receive all reward tiers from the $750 tier + 7 EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF ANTHYMN which come with 25% CHARACTER LEGACY BONUS.

BECOME A STAINED GLASS PORTRAIT IN THE GAME!! With a supplied photograph and some additional input from you, a talented String Theory artist will craft a custom portrait immortalizing you in one of the province\u2019s music conservatories forever! You\u2019ll also receive an ART PRINT OF YOUR PORTRAIT signed by the development team. You will also receive all rewards from the $500 reward tier + 10 EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF ANTHYMN which come with 35% CHARACTER LEGACY BONUS.

HELP BUILD A PROVINCIAL TAVERN! One of the features that makes Anthymn so unique is the tavern system where bands can perform their songs to an audience. Now you can design and build one of these legendary locations by filling out our tavern sheet with layout, lighting, materials and atmosphere options.  You will also be able to design SIX NPC CHARACTERS to help provide the countless Maestros and Champions sitting at your bar extraordinary service. You will also receive all rewards from the $750 tier + 10 EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF ANTHYMN which come with 50% CHARACTER LEGACY BONUS.

NAME AND HELP DESIGN AN ACOUSTIC ENVIRONMENT! With ongoing personal interaction with our environments team you\u2019ll be able to raise mountains, carve canyons and shape rivers to your will. The best part is, you\u2019ll also decide if your secluded location should cause strings to echo, brass pierce or drums to thunder by choosing the acoustic characteristics with our sound team.  Once complete, our writers will help you choose a name and shape provincial lore around it.  Who knows, Tiarnen himself might one day set foot in it!  You will also receive all rewards from the $750 tier + 10 EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF ANTHYMN which come with 60% CHARACTER LEGACY BONUS.

The Ultimate Pledge Pack!! We really want to thank you for your generous pledge in person. You will receive an INVITE TO THE ANYTHMN DEVELOPER LAUNCH PARTY + you and a friend will spend a day hanging out at String Theory Studios and get a behind the scenes tour. You must be able to pay for travel and accommodations to the String Theory office in Vancouver, BC for the party and tour day. You will also receive a PHYSICAL REPLICA COPY OF TIARNEN\u2019S LEGENDARY PICCOLO and all rewards from the $750 tier + 15 EXTRA DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES OF ANTHYMN which come with DOUBLE CHARACTER LEGACY BONUS.
